research_template: You will be provided with an abstract of a scientific document and other references papers in triple quotes. Your task is to write the related work section of the document using only the provided abstracts and other references papers. You should cite the other related documents as (@cite_#) whenever it is referred in the related work. Do not cite abstract. Do not provide references at the end. Provide the output in max 200 words.
llama_template: You will be provided with an abstract of a scientific document and other references papers in triple quotes. Your task is to write the related work section of the document using only the provided abstracts and other references papers. You should cite the other related documents as (@cite_#) whenever it is referred in the related work. Do not cite abstract. Do not include any extra notes or newline characters at the end. Do not copy the abstracts of reference papers directly. Do not provide the output in bullet points. Do not provide references at the end. Provide the output in max 200 words.
abstract_template: You will be provided with an abstract and other references papers in triple quotes. Given the abstract and the relevant papers, provide a related work section for a research paper citing the sources correctly. Provide the scientific related work section in max 200 words. Do not provide the output in bullet points. Do not provide references at the end.
per_cite_template: You will be provided with an abstract of a scientific document and other references paper in triple quotes. Your task is to write the related work section of the document using only the provided abstracts and other references papers. You should cite the other related documents as (@cite_#) whenever it is referred in the related work, comparing with the main paper. Do not cite abstract. Do not provide references at the end. Provide the output in 1-2 sentence.
cot_template: You will be provided with a rough draft of related work section of a scientific paper in triple quotes. Paraphrase and summarize the related work section in max 400 words by referring and citing sources correctly as done in the draft. Do not provide the output in bullet points but write fluent natural language paragraphs. Do not provide references at the end. You should cite the other related documents as (@cite_#) whenever it is referred in the related work.
cot_v1_template: You will be provided with a rough draft of related work section of a scientific paper in triple quotes. Summarize the related work section in max 200 words by citing sources correctly.
cot_v0_template: You will be provided with a rough draft of related work section of a scientific paper in triple quotes. Paraphrase and summarize the related work section in max 500 words by referring and citing sources correctly as done in the draft.
cot_v2_template: You will be provided with a rough draft of related work section of a scientific paper in triple quotes. Paraphrase and summarize the related work section in max 400 words by referring and citing sources correctly as done in the draft. Do not provide the output in bullet points but write in natural language. You should cite the other related documents as (@cite_#) whenever it is referred in the related work.
vanilla_template: You will be provided with an abstract of a scientific document and other references papers in triple quotes. Your task is to write the related work section of the document using only the provided abstracts and other references papers. Please write the related work section creating a cohesive storyline by doing a critical analysis of prior work comparing the strengths and weaknesses while also motivating the proposed approach. You should cite the other related documents as (@cite_#) whenever it is referred in the related work. Do not cite abstract. Do not include any extra notes or newline characters at the end. Do not copy the abstracts of reference papers directly but compare and contrast to the main work concisely. Do not provide the output in bullet points. Do not provide references at the end. Provide the output in max 200 words.
vanilla_template_full_text: You will be provided with an abstract and main contents of a scientific document and other references papers in triple quotes. Your task is to write the related work section of the document using only the provided main paper text, abstracts and other references papers. Please write the related work section creating a cohesive storyline by doing a critical analysis of prior work comparing the strengths and weaknesses while also motivating the proposed approach. You should cite the other related documents as (@cite_#) whenever it is referred in the related work. Do not cite abstract. Do not include any extra notes or newline characters at the end. Do not copy the abstracts of reference papers directly but compare and contrast to the main work concisely. Do not provide the output in bullet points. Do not provide references at the end. Provide the output in max 200 words.
vanilla_template_word_based: You will be provided with an abstract and main contents of a scientific document and other references papers in triple quotes. Your task is to write the related work section of the document using only the provided main paper text, abstracts and other references papers. Please write the related work section creating a cohesive storyline by doing a critical analysis of prior work comparing the strengths and weaknesses while also motivating the proposed approach. You should cite the other related documents as (@cite_#) whenever it is referred in the related work. Do not cite abstract. Do not include any extra notes or newline characters at the end. Do not copy the abstracts of reference papers directly but compare and contrast to the main work concisely. Do not provide the output in bullet points. Do not provide references at the end. Provide the output in max {num_gt_words} words.
plan_template: You will be provided with an abstract of a scientific document and other references papers in triple quotes. Your task is to write the related work section of the document using only the provided abstracts and other references papers. Please write the related work section creating a cohesive storyline by doing a critical analysis of prior work comparing the strengths and weaknesses while also motivating the proposed approach. You are also provided a plan mentioning the total number of lines and the citations to refer in different lines. You should cite all the other related documents as (@cite_#) whenever it is referred in the related work. Do not cite abstract. Do not include any extra notes or newline characters at the end. Do not copy the abstracts of reference papers directly but compare and contrast to the main work concisely. Do not provide the output in bullet points. Do not provide references at the end. Please cite all the provided reference papers. Please follow the plan when generating sentences, especially the number of lines to generate. Provide the output in max 200 words.

plan_learned_template:
You will be provided with an abstract of a scientific document and other reference papers in triple quotes. Your task is to write the related work section of the document using only the content from provided abstract and all of the other reference papers. Please generate the related work creating a cohesive storyline by doing a critical analysis of related work comparing the strengths and weaknesses while also motivating the new work. You should cite all the other related documents as (@cite_#) whenever referring them in the related work. Do not cite abstract. Do not include any extra notes or newline characters at the end. Do not copy the abstracts of reference papers directly but compare and contrast to the main work concisely. Do not provide the output in bullet points. Do not provide references at the end. Provide the output in max 200 words. You could also group multiple citations in the same line. You should first generate a plan, mentioning the total number of lines, words and the citations to refer to in different lines. You should follow this plan when generating sentences. 
 Example: 

 Plan: Generate the related work in [number] lines using max [number] words. Cite @cite_# on line [number]. Cite @cite_# on line [number].
plan_-1_learned_template:
You will be provided with an abstract of a scientific document and other reference papers in triple quotes. Your task is to write the related work section of the document using only the content from provided abstracts and other reference papers. Please generate the related work creating a cohesive storyline by doing a critical analysis of prior work comparing the strengths and weaknesses while also motivating the new work. You should cite the other related documents as (@cite_#) whenever it is referred to in the related work. Do not cite abstract. Do not include any extra notes or newline characters at the end. Do not copy the abstracts of reference papers directly but compare and contrast to the main work concisely. Do not provide the output in bullet points. Do not provide references at the end. Provide the output in max 200 words. You should first generate a plan, mentioning the total number of lines, words and the citations to refer to in different lines. You should follow this plan when generating sentences. 
 Example: 

 Plan: Generate the related work in [number] lines using max [number] words. Cite @cite_# on line [number]. Cite @cite_# on line [number].
suffix_plan_learned_template:
Remember, the output should be in the format:
 Plan: 

 Related Work:
per_sentence_template: You are assisting a researcher to write a related work section of a paper sentence by sentence. You will be provided with an abstract of the scientific document and raw draft of generated related work till now in triple quotes. Additionally, you will be provided with a reference paper if it has to be cited in the sentence. Your task is to write another 1 sentence for the related work section of the document or paraphrase the draft using only the abstract and other reference papers if provided. Initially, the raw draft would be empty. Please complete the related work creating a cohesive storyline by doing a critical analysis of prior work comparing the strengths and weaknesses while also motivating the proposed approach. You should cite the other related documents as (@cite_#) only whenever it is referred to in the related work. Do not cite abstract. Do not include any extra notes or newline characters at the end. Do not copy the abstracts of reference papers directly but compare and contrast to the main work concisely. Do not provide the output in bullet points. Do not provide references at the end. Provide the output in max 200 words. Provide the complete related work including the new sentence.
